archimate:Requirement.name: 4.52.6 Firewall critical networks control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Specialized firewalls should be used to protect critical networks and systems by: performing deep packet inspection on network traffic between IP-enabled components, to help detect sophisticated attacks processing and interpreting a wide range of proprietary or imprecisely defined network protocols (e.g. MODBUS, PROFIBUS, DNP3 and CIP) handling protocol-specific rules, to help defeat attacks against protocol vulnerabilities.
